name: Here Comes Team Rocket!

historicalClassification.note: Originally printed as a Trainer. Would be classified as Supporter by modern rules.

effect.text: Each player plays with his or her Prize cards face up for the rest of the game.

tips: Play early to maximize information advantage
Combine with Rattata's Trickery to swap Prize cards

competitiveHistory: This non-holo version is functionally identical to the holo version (#15). Revealing Prize cards eliminated hidden information and enabled Prize manipulation strategies.

rulings.ruling: Once played, Prize cards remain face-up for the rest of the game.
